Today, Dan tells "Replacement Jordan" [[Marty DeRosa]] about the time that Rowdy Roddy Piper unfortunately appeared on the Alex Jones Show. It's real sad to wrestle with how dumb Piper is, given how cool he seems to have been, but reality is reality. Also, Dan and Marty get off-track about a hundred times, mostly about cop TV shows.

==Tidbits==

*Dan and Marty discuss great heels of wrestling
*Alex claims wrestling fans are idiots and that he's tougher than wrestlers
*Alex botches the intro of Roddy
*Alex loves They Live and thinks it's a documentary
*Roddy is pretty insane
*Roddy thinks They Live is timeless and still applicable today
*They Live is about Reaganomics
*Did you know Planet of the Apes was on Monday Night Raw?
*Exploration of Reagan's idiocy and policy: fuck the homeless
*Roddy is likely an InfoWarrior
*Alex says he could be open to a one world government
*Alex is totally a starfucker
*Roddy thinks that the Bronswik Affair is true and that QVC is mind control

==Notable Bits==
